post:
White-Labelled WHMCS Cloud VPS Reseller Program is the answer to your business needs! Visit our WHMCS Cloud VPS Reseller page for all the details. We will install and configure the WHMCS module for automation (you must create the packages yourself).

Ideal for:
  • Web Hosting Providers
  • Web developers
  • Web Designers
  • Platform as a Service (PaaS) Providers
  • IT Consultants
  • Marketers

Advantages:
  • Low cost with a WHMCS module included (fully automated)
  • White-labelled, become a cloud VPS provider without the upfront investment or virtualization experience
  • We manage all the hardware & hypervisors
  • cPanel/WHM available
  • R1Soft backups available

Packages:

Cloud Reseller 1
2 vCPU
4 GB RAM
50 GB Disk
2 TB Transfer
4 IPs
$49 per month -> $24.50 per month for the first three months!

Cloud Reseller 2
4 vCPU
8 GB RAM
100 GB Disk

$99 per month -> $49.50 per month for the first three months!

Click Here to Order! (COUPON CODE: RESELL50)
